import Link from 'next/link' const Intro = (props)=>{ const {posts, intro} = props; return(
{intro.caption}
Business
{posts.business}
Politics
{posts.politics}
Celebrities
{posts.celebrities}
Sports
{posts.sport}
Tech & Innovation
{posts.tech_inno}
Health
{posts.health}
Latest News
{posts.latest_news}
Top News
{posts.top_news}
) } export default Intro
